abilities.name: Danger Perception
abilities.effect: As long as Scizor ex's remaining HP is 60 or less, Scizor ex does 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Scizor ex by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.
